summary: Iteration 18 - Inventory Module Navigation & CRM Dynamic Forms Testing: All 10 features tested and PASSED. Inventory sidebar navigation (Warehouses, Stock Register, Stock Transfers, Adjustments) is fully functional. CRM forms (Accounts, Quotations, Samples, Leads) load correctly with proper UI components and Field Registry integration.

issues: Minor accessibility warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - not critical

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Inventory and CRM features are working correctly. The useFieldRegistry hook is properly integrated in AccountsList, QuotationsList, SamplesList, and LeadsPage components.

1_inventory_navigation.details: Inventory sidebar group expands correctly showing: Stock & Items, Warehouses, Stock Register, Stock Transfers, Adjustments, Advanced

2_warehouse_dashboard.details: Dashboard loads with 5 warehouse cards, summary stats (Total Warehouses, Stock Value, Pending Transfers, Low Stock Alerts), quick actions, and pending transfers section

3_stock_register.details: Page loads with summary stats (Total SKUs, Total Quantity, Total Value, Low Stock Items), search, warehouse filter, and stock table

4_stock_transfers.details: Page loads with status filters (All, Draft, In Transit, Received), transfer list with Dispatch/Receive actions, New Transfer button

5_stock_adjustments.details: Page loads with type and status filters, adjustment list table, New Adjustment button

6_crm_accounts_form.details: Add Account dialog opens with 4 tabs: Basic Info, Addresses, Contacts, Credit & Terms. Form fields include Customer Name, Account Type, GSTIN, PAN, Industry, Website, etc. Customize Fields button present.

7_crm_quotations_form.details: New Quotation dialog opens with Customer search select, Contact Person, Reference, Valid Until, Line Items table (Item Name, HSN, Qty, Unit, Price, Disc%, Tax%, Total), Transport, Payment Terms, Terms & Conditions, and totals calculation. Customize Fields button present.

8_crm_samples_form.details: New Sample dialog opens with Customer select, Contact Person, Sample Items table (Product Name, Specs, Qty, Unit), From Location, Courier, Tracking Number, Expected Delivery, Feedback Due Date, Purpose, Notes. Customize Fields button present.

9_leads_dynamic_form.details: Add Lead dialog renders dynamic form with sections: Basic Info (Company Name*, Contact Person*, Email, Phone, Source), Address (Address, Country, Pincode, State, District, City), Classification (Customer Type, Assigned To, Stage, Industry, Products of Interest multiselect), Follow-up (Estimated Value, Next Follow-up Date, Follow-up Activity, Notes). Required field markers (*) shown. Customize Fields button present.

10_crm_overview.details: CRM Dashboard loads with stats cards (9 Leads, 12 Accounts, 4 Quotations, 4 Samples), Conversion Rate, Total Quote Value, Samples Pending, Leads by Status/Source charts, Quotations by Status, Top Outstanding Accounts, Recent Leads, Recent Quotations

console_warnings: Minor: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent (accessibility warning, not critical)
